project.name: Tool Integrations: Copy from Classpath to Working Folder
project.description:
Copy files matching a classpath pattern (e.g. Activiti workflow definitions and Drools decision table spreadsheets) to the application working folder.
Also copy all built-in Spring configuration files from the WAR file to $HOME/.acm/default-config/spring directory and all custom Spring configuration files to $HOME/.acm/custom-config/spring directory. Then, compare custom defined beans with built-in ones and create DIFF files when there is a difference.
